title: Alec Baldwin fires a prop gun on a movie set, killing one person and injuring another
author: CBS Mornings
description:
Sheriffs in Santa Fe, New Mexico, say actor and co-producer Alec Baldwin fired a prop gun on the set of his movie "Rust," killing the director of photography and injuring the director. They say their investigation into what happened is "open and active." Jonathan Vigliotti reports.

Each weekday morning, "CBS Mornings” co-hosts Gayle King, Tony Dokoupil and Nate Burleson bring you the latest breaking news, smart conversation and in-depth feature reporting. "CBS Mornings" airs weekdays at 7 a.m. on CBS and 8 a.m. ET on CBSN.

localize.title: アレック・ボールドウィンが映画のセットで小道具の銃を発砲し、1人が死亡、1人が負傷
亚历克-鲍德温在电影拍摄现场发射道具枪，导致一人死亡，另一人受伤
亞歷克-鮑德溫在電影拍攝現場發射道具槍，導致一人死亡，另一人受傷
